| HistoryText             = This team was composed of [[China|Chinese]] [[Homo superior|mutants]] who lived in [[Tian (China)|Tian]], "Heaven", a floating city set in a five square mile forest area of [[China]].

They hid there, a screen covering them even from [[Cerebro (Mutant Detector)|Cerebro]] or [[Cerebra (Mutant Detector)|Cerebra]] until [[Wanda Maximoff (Earth-616)|Scarlet Witch]] depowered them during the [[M-Day]]. They were killed either by this event or by the [[Annex Squads (Earth-89149)|Annex Squads]] of an [[Earth-89149|alternate reality]].

Looking at Tian's structure, it was speculated that at least a few of those mutants were psionics and energy creators.

Their bodies were found a few month later by the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]], when they came to Tian, the last entry of the [[Triploid Mutant (Artificial Mutant) (Earth-616)|Triploid Mutant]]'s notebook (who was investigating the Annex Squads).

| Equipment               = The members of this team all wore white shirts and red pants, as monks.
| Transportation          = 
| Weapons                 = 

| Notes                   = The team was actually never referenced by an other name than "The Chinese X-Men".
